thread.title: Judi Dench Just Wants Some Motherfuckin' Star Wars Spoilers
thread.title_full: Judi Dench Just Wants Some Motherfuckin' Star Wars Spoilers

author: Mat Whitehead
title: Judi Dench Just Wants Some Motherfuckin' Star Wars Spoilers
text:
View this image ›
Warner Bros. (That’s the Hogwarts Express. I couldn’t find a GIF of the Orient Express don’t @ me.)
The cast also includes Michelle Pfeiffer, Johnny Depp, Willem Dafoe, Penélope Cruz, Olivia Colman, Leslie Odom Jr, and Judi Dench. And that’s not even everyone!!!
ID: 10494250 2. A few weeks ago, Josh invited the Star Wars star to his trailer to ask her a few casual questions about her other upcoming film, The Last Jedi . It didn’t go so well. Facebook: video.php ID: 10494276 3. So Josh filmed an apology… or what started as an apology, with a few more sneaky questions hidden as “script edits”. Facebook: video.php ID: 10494294 4. But when it looked like all hope was lost, Josh had another brilliant plan. He brought out the big guns: DAME JUDI DENCH. Facebook: video.php ID: 10494301 5. Grilling Daisy relentlessly, and dressed like a damn queen, Dame Judi was NOT going to leave that trailer without some damn answers. Facebook: joshgad ID: 10494335 6. And then, in a dramatic twist, Dench might have revealed her own Jedi powers, using mind-control to get Daisy to FINALLY answer some questions! View this image ›
Facebook: joshgad Naturally that’s when the damn video cut out.
ID: 10494377 7. Murder on the Orient Express is scheduled to be released in November, with Star Wars: The Last Jedi following in December. View this image ›
LucasFilm / Disney Here’s hoping Dame Judi drops us some hints before then.
ID: 10494390 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
Mat Whitehead is a staff writer for BuzzFeed and is based in Sydney.
